body:
My internet is being terrible on me. I keep lagging on avicus and it's hard to play minecraft in general. Some other games are fine just not that one. Maybe every once and a while I could play but this is really frustrating me.

Yeah there are going to be a delay in videos but what can I do.


We're moving into a new house and my parents promised better internet.

See you all in a month.
